::KitKat::

She listened to the message. "Hmm. Interesting." She replied to the 
message. "I would like to hear what your plans are. Please contact me 
when you can and we shall talk."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     He sat down in his control chair and opened a comm to Kit Kat's 
base. "Kit Kat, My name is Magmatron, I hope I haven't interupted 
anything. I wish to speak with you. I have some ideas for your attack 
on the Alliance. Please contact me soon."
